## Before you submit, please confirm:

- [ ] This isn't just "add more meeting names" (those go straight to a PR, no issue needed)
- [ ] This doesn't involve adding a database (we're keeping it stateless)
- [ ] This doesn't involve authentication (we respect people's time)
- [ ] This doesn't involve blockchain (please no)
- [ ] This doesn't involve AI-generated meeting names (the puns must be human-crafted)
